==German== ===Etymology=== {{PIE root|de|ǵʰengʰ}} From {{inh|de|gmh|ingang}}, from {{inh|de|goh|ingang||entrance}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*inngangaz}}. Cognate with {{cog|nl|ingang||entrance}}, {{cog|en|ingang||entrance}}. More at {{l|en|ingang}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈʔaɪ̯nˌɡaŋ/}} * {{audio|de|De-Eingang.OGG|audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m|Eingangs|gen2=Einganges|Eingänge}} # [[entrance]], [[entry]] # [[arrival]] # [[input]] # entrance [[gate]], [[doorway]], [[hall]], [[passage]] # [[orifice]] # [[inlet]], [[mouth]] {{gloss|of a river}} # [[introduction]] # [[importation]] # [[access]] # [[beginning]], [[preface]], [[preamble]], [[prologue]] # [[receipt]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-m|(e)s|pl=Eingänge}} ====Antonyms==== * {{l|de|Ausgang}} ====Derived terms==== {{der2 |de|eingängig |Eingangstür |Eingangstor |Eingangsöffnung |Eingangswort |Hauseingang |Haupteingang |Nebeneingang |Nachteingang |Schuleingang |Hofeingang }} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} * [https://www.dwds.de/wb/Eingang Eingang] in DWDS (''Digitales Wörterbuch der deutschen Sprache'')
